name: A. Yet Another Promotion
statement:
The famous store "Second Food" sells groceries only two days a month.
And the prices in each of days differ. You wanted to buy n kilos of
potatoes for a month. You know that on the first day of the month 1 kilo
of potatoes costs a coins, and on the second day b coins. In "Second
Food" you can buy any kilograms of potatoes.Fortunately, "Second Food"
has announced a promotion for potatoes, which is valid only on the first
day of the month for each m kilos of potatoes you buy, you get 1 kilo as
a gift! In other words, you can get m + 1 kilograms by paying for m
kilograms.Find the minimum number of coins that you have to spend to buy
n kilos of potatoes.
